Control object for a workflow

Source: R/control.R
control_workflow.Rd

control_workflow() holds the control parameters for a workflow.

control_workflow(control_parsnip = NULL)

Arguments

control_parsnip

A parsnip control object. If NULL, a default control argument is constructed from parsnip::control_parsnip().

Examples

control_workflow()
#> <control_workflow>

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples

workflows is a part of the tidymodels ecosystem, a collection of modeling packages designed with common APIs and a shared philosophy.
